summary: Test module that validates the Stable Diffusion 2 image generation pipeline using the v‑prediction model. It provides quick unit tests with lightweight dummy components and comprehensive integration tests with real models, exercising multiple schedulers, precision settings, and resource handling to ensure correct outputs and deterministic behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the Stable Diffusion v‑prediction pipeline for production use, enabling early detection of regressions and confirming that various configurations produce expected image results.
